scenes.text: Atul Gawande is a famous surgeon.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a surgeon in scrubs standing confidently with arms crossed over chest, centered in the frame. A nameplate below shows 'ATUL GAWANDE'. Two diploma icons float on either side of the surgeon. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: He was curious about something disturbing.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, the surgeon in scrubs centered in the frame with one eyebrow raised and furrowed brow. Right hand holds a magnifying glass up to a document. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: World-class surgeons were making preventable mistakes.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, three surgeons in scrubs arranged in a row across the center. Above each surgeon's head, a warning triangle with exclamation point. Below each, a diploma icon. Simple cartoon style with clean lines, consistent surgeon design across all three figures.

scenes.text: Mistakes they knew better than to make.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a surgeon in scrubs centered in the frame. A thought bubble above their head shows a checkmark. Their hands below hold surgical tools at wrong angles with an X beside them. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a surgeon in scrubs centered in the frame. Two diploma icons on the left, two award icons on the right. The word 'BAD' with a large X crossed through it floats above their head. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: They were excellent doctors having bad moments.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a horizontal timeline stretches across the center. Five checkmark icons are spaced along the line, with one X icon in the middle. A surgeon in scrubs stands below the timeline. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: So Gawande worked with the World Health Organization and developed a 19-step surgical checklist.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, the surgeon in scrubs on the left labeled 'GAWANDE' shaking hands with a figure on the right. A WHO logo centered above them. A document below shows '19-STEP CHECKLIST'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: You think it's super technical, right?
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a large thought bubble centered in the frame. Inside the bubble: complex equations, molecular diagrams, and intricate procedure charts. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, intricate surgical tools arranged on the left side: scalpels, clamps, scissors. On the right side, a complicated anatomical diagram with many labeled parts. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, the text 'WRONG' in large bold letters centered in the frame. A large X floats to the right of the text. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a surgeon in scrubs on the left, right hand holding a patient's wrist with wristband, left hand holding a chart. On the right side, a checklist with checkbox and text 'CONFIRM IDENTITY'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, an IV bag on a stand on the left side of the frame. On the right side, a checklist with checkbox and text 'ANTIBIOTICS'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Mark the correct leg to operate on.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a surgeon in scrubs on the left, leaning down with a marker in hand, drawing an X on a patient's leg. The patient lies on a table on the right. On the far right, a checklist with checkbox and text 'MARK SITE'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: So you don't chop off the wrong one.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, two legs shown side by side in the center. The left leg has an X mark on it with label 'CORRECT' above. The right leg is unmarked with label 'WRONG' above. An arrow points down toward the marked leg. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, three simple icons arranged in a horizontal row across the center: a wristband icon on the left, a medicine bottle icon in the middle, a marker icon on the right. The word 'ELEMENTARY' in bold text floats above the icons. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, five surgeons in scrubs arranged in a horizontal row across the center, all nodding with heads tilted down and eyes closed in agreement. Simple cartoon style with clean lines, consistent surgeon design across all five figures.

scenes.text: When hospitals put this simple checklist into practice, something remarkable happened.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a hospital building on the left with a plus sign on it. On the right, a checklist document labeled '19 STEPS'. An arrow connects the checklist to the hospital. Sparkles surround the hospital. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a vertical bar chart centered in the frame. A tall bar on the left labeled 'BEFORE', a shorter bar on the right labeled 'AFTER'. A downward arrow between them with '36%' text beside the arrow. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a vertical bar chart centered in the frame. A tall bar on the left labeled 'BEFORE', a much shorter bar on the right labeled 'AFTER'. A downward arrow between them with '47%' text beside the arrow. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, two identical surgeons in scrubs side by side. An equals sign floats between them. Label 'BEFORE' below the left surgeon, label 'AFTER' below the right surgeon. Simple cartoon style with clean lines, consistent surgeon design.

On a black background, two identical horizontal bar meters side by side, each with five segments all filled. An equals sign floats between them. Label 'SKILLS' below each meter. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, two identical hospital buildings with plus signs, side by side. An equals sign floats between them. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, a simple checklist document centered in the frame with five checkbox items. A soft glow radiates outward from the checklist edges. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: When cognitive load peaks, even experts fail.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two strained dot eyes and grimacing mouth on the frontal lobe, centered in the frame. Multiple arrow inputs point at the brain from all directions. The brain's arms clutch its sides. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a surgeon in scrubs falling downward in the center, arms outstretched. Below the surgeon, a large checklist document stretched horizontally like a safety net, catching them. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Here's the paradox nobody talks about.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a standing cartoon person on the left side leaning forward, one hand cupped beside mouth, eyebrows raised. On the right side, the word 'PARADOX' in bold text with a soft glow around it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: The better you get at something, the more you need systems.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a graph with X-axis labeled 'EXPERTISE' and Y-axis labeled 'SYSTEMS NEEDED'. A diagonal line rises from bottom-left to top-right. An arrow follows the upward line. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, the word 'LESS' in small faded text centered in the frame, with a large X crossed through it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, the word 'MORE' in large bold text centered in the frame. Three upward arrows above the word. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Pilots with 10,000 hours of flying still read the same checklist every single flight.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a pilot in uniform seated in a cockpit on the left, holding a checklist document in both hands, looking down at it. A badge on their chest shows '10,000 HRS'. Cockpit controls visible behind them. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Not because they forgot how to fly.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, the pilot in uniform centered in the frame. A thought bubble above their head shows an airplane and cockpit controls. The word 'FORGOT' with a large X crossed through it floats to the right. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: Because they don't trust their memory under pressure.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, the pilot in uniform on the left with furrowed brow. A thought bubble above shows wavy, distorted lines representing unclear memory. Warning indicators and alarm symbols surround the thought bubble. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, the pilot in uniform on the left holding a checklist. A large checkmark floats on the right side of the frame. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, the pilot in uniform on the left extending a checklist document toward a standing cartoon person on the right. The cartoon person reaches out with both hands to receive it. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: I make three checklists for my life.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, three checklist documents arranged in a horizontal row across the center. The left one labeled '1', the middle one labeled '2', the right one labeled '3'. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a checklist document centered in the frame. At the top, 'TO-DO LIST' in bold text. Below it, 'EXECUTION' as subtitle. Five checkbox items listed below. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, a calendar page centered in the frame with 'TODAY' in bold at the top. Three task items with checkboxes listed below. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

On a black background, a checklist document centered in the frame. At the top, 'TO-WANT LIST' in bold text. Below it, 'EXPANSION' as subtitle. Five checkbox items listed below. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: What I'm building toward this month.

On a black background, a checklist document centered in the frame. At the top, 'TO-BE LIST' in bold text. Below it, 'EVOLUTION' as subtitle. Five checkbox items listed below. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: They're about creating bandwidth for your brain so it can focus on what actually matters.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two focused dot eyes and a calm smile on the frontal lobe, centered in the frame. Messy scribbles pushed to the far left and right edges of the frame. Open space surrounds the brain. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
On a black background, a large rectangular block centered in the frame labeled 'HARD THINGS'. A soft glow radiates outward from the block edges. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: But there's still one final problem.
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a warning triangle centered in the frame with an exclamation point inside. Below the triangle, the text 'ONE MORE PROBLEM' in bold. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: What if your brain tries to bypass the system entirely?
scenes.prompt: On a black background, a cartoon brain with small stick arms and stick legs, two sneaky dot eyes and sly grin on the frontal lobe, tiptoeing on the left side. A wall labeled 'SYSTEMS' in the center. The brain's body leans toward going around the wall. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.

scenes.text: We have to go to a monastery.

On a black background, the text 'WHY?' in large bold letters centered in the frame. The question mark is extra large. Simple cartoon style with clean lines.
